code: import'./btn-group.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AppFilter=function AppFilter(props){var buttonsData=[{label:'All employees',name:'all'},{label:'Salary over 1000 $',name:'moreThan1000'},{label:'Rising',name:'rise'}];var buttons=buttonsData.map(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name,label=_ref.label;var active=props.filter===name;var style=active?'btn-light':'btn-outline-light';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onFilterSelect(name);},className:"btn ".concat(style),children:label},name);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn-group",children:buttons});};export default AppFilter;
